item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Eamonn. This is my research blog where I share articles, notes, and experiments. I am interested in machine learning, decision-making systems, and writing clear technical explanations. You can replace the image on the left by adding your own file in static/images/ and updating profile_image in this file.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is a starter post so you can see the homepage article list working immediately.
